title: In this day and age of 100% assured climate change, why are nukes still around?
body: We're already all screwed, all of us. It's going to turn into Waterworld or some other apocalyptic scenario, so why are we still hanging onto these devices that can turn the world into an even shittier toilet? Climate change is coming for every last human being and it is absolute and guaranteed, having nukes around is impossibly illogical in this scenario.
